# beget_compute_snapshot (Resource)

Compute snapshot resource. Creates point-in-time backups of compute instances for restoration and cloning.

## Example Usage
```terraform
# Create snapshot of compute instance
resource "beget_compute_snapshot" "main" {
  compute_instance_id = "8838e90e-5bfd-4cc5-9edc-550135c83800"
  description         = "Backup before major update"
}

output "snapshot" {
  value = {
    id                  = beget_compute_snapshot.main.id
    compute_instance_id = beget_compute_snapshot.main.compute_instance_id
    status              = beget_compute_snapshot.main.status
    size                = beget_compute_snapshot.main.size
    region              = beget_compute_snapshot.main.region
  }
}
```
<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `compute_instance_id` (String) Compute Instance ID for which snapshot is created

### Optional

- `description` (String) Snapshot description

### Read-Only

- `compute_instance_name` (String) Compute Instance Name for which snapshot is created
- `configuration` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--configuration))
- `date_create` (String) Date create
- `id` (String) Snapshot ID
- `region` (String) Snapshot region
- `size` (String) Snapshot size
- `status` (String) Current status (`CREATING`,`DONE`,`RESTORING`,`DELETED`,`ERROR`)

<a id="nestedatt--configuration"></a>
### Nested Schema for `configuration`

Read-Only:

- `cpu` (Number)
- `disk_mb` (Number)
- `ram_mb` (Number)
